description.lang: flush-mounted motorcontroller for shutter (ROUTING-SLAVE Device)lush-mount Z-Wave shutter switchFor wireless control of: Shutters, awnings, sun blinds,garage door drives or stairwell light, combinable with all Z-Wave transmitters and remote controls, switch contact: potential-free change-over contact, Switching time: automatically 2 minutes, Switching capacity: ohmic 1800 W inductive 460 VA, HV halogen lamps 500 W, Operating voltage: 230 V~, 50 HzItem no.TypePackingEAN codePUC05436 3-D carton, 1 pc4 008297 05436 81
